அன்பால் உலகை வெல்லும் மோடி பாரதத்தின் பொக்கிஷம் மோடி உலகமக்களின் நலனில் உண்மையான அக்கறை கொண்ட மோடி அன்பால் உலகை வெல்லும் மோடி வந்தேமாதரம் ஜெய்ஹிந்த்

Pope should be invited to India. As the head of a church he needs to be greeted by Hindu Pontiffs such as a Shankaracharya or someone appointed by them. He should be invited to participate in a Hindu ritual in front of a Hindu deity to show that he respects all religions or whatever. Then he should be given a tour of somewhere like Goa which should have a Goan Holocaust Museum to remember the atrocities committed by the Christians during their inquisition and he can make an apology. He should be asked on camera if he believes that unconverted Hindus will burn for eternity in hell and if not then what is the point of their mission?
